home.headline: The Governance Aepp
home.text: On the home page all listed polls are shown. The different tabs can be used to filter and/or sort the polls. To navigate the aepp, use the buttons at the bottom of the screen.

items.text: Switch tabs to filter and/or sort the listed polls.
For each poll a quick summary is displayed. For more information click on one of the polls.
Use the bottom buttons to navigate around the aepp.

poll.headline: The Poll Page
poll.text: On this page the poll details are displayed. If you have a wallet connected, you can see your account including delegated stake at the top. To vote, tap the check mark at the left of any option. To see, which account voted for what poll, tap on the arrow on the right side of an option.

items.text: The poll title, description and link are a description and extension of the question.
The account that introduced the vote to the blockchain.
To cast your vote in this poll, select a check mark or click on the option for more details.
Use the bottom buttons to navigate around the aepp.

account.headline: The Account Page
account.text: The account page displays stake, votes, delegations and more about any aeternity account. If you have a wallet connected and you visit your own account page, you can create or modify your stake delegation.

items.text: The accounts address, its stake and the delegated stake are display in the account summary.
The account from the summary has delegated its stake to this account.
All accounts that delegated their stake to this account are listed here.
All votes that this account or any delegated account casted are listed here.
All polls that this account authored are listed in this tab.
Use the bottom buttons to navigate around the aepp.
